A brief overview of my education and research experiences.

### Research
--**Laboratory of Dr. Junhyong Kim, University of Pennsylvania Biology Department**
<br>
As a research technician in Dr. Kim's lab, which focuses on single cell and sub-cellular transcriptomics to understand the biology of the cell, I was responsible for running and maintaining the lab's Illumina Next Generation Sequencer.
    
--**NYS Office of the Attorney General, Environmental Protection Bureau**
<br>
As a science intern, I researched and validated claims made in a 2018 legal complaint about PFAS groundwater contamination in the Hudson Valley of New York.
